title: Goreu

properties.name: description
properties.value: Goreu is one of the many citizens of Lletya.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Goreu
Goreu
Released19 July 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceElf
LocationLletya
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to, Pickpocket
ExamineAn elf of Lletya.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5297

Goreu is one of the many citizens of Lletya.

The player can only access Goreu to pickpocket after starting Mourning's End Part I and require level 85 Thieving. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 353.3 Thieving experience.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Pickpocketing
    • 2.1 Pickpocket chance
    • 2.2 Pickpocketing info
    • 2.3 Loot
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 5 Trivia

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Goreu is the solution to the master anagram clue: RUE GO. He will then give the player either a light box or a puzzle box.

Goreu
Level required 85
Thieving XP353.3 xp
TypePickpocket
ToolNone

Loot[edit | edit source]

A successful pickpocket attempt will gain one the following items:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins280–350105/128280–350280–350
Death rune28/128378216
Nature rune35/128591324
Jug of wine16/12820
Diamond11/1281,8321,200
Fire orb12/1281,730180
Gold ore11/12829890

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Goreu derives from the word "Gorau", which is a Welsh word for "Best".
